poem:
Title: The Play Within Shadows

In Brussels peals brawler bell,
A crier for clandestine swell.
Russian weft in European web,
Stirs the hawks in Strasbourg's bed.
Search for snakes in hollow halls,
Under guise of justice's calls.
Yet, in truth, what moves the pawn?
Lurks far deeper, before dawn.
Battles waged on chessboard vast,
Shadows cast of wars' enthralling past.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Russia-Ukraine war live: police search European parliament over possible Russian interference 4.04pm BST Closing summary Belgian police have searched the European parliament office and Brussels home of a parliamentary staffer who is believed to have played “a significant role” in a Russian interference operation, the national prosecutor has said. French authorities also carried out a search of the employee’s European parliament office in Strasbourg at the request of the Belgian examining magistrate overseeing the inquiry". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Russia-Ukraine war live: police search European parliament over possible Russian interference 4.04pm BST Closing summary Belgian police have searched the European parliament office and Brussels home of a parliamentary staffer who is believed to have played “a significant role” in a Russian interference operation, the national prosecutor has said. French authorities also carried out a search of the employee’s European parliament office in Strasbourg at the request of the Belgian examining magistrate overseeing the inquiry
